General.Name: tonies SE
General.Description: tonies SE develops and markets audio systems for children. It offers Toniebox, a connected audio player for kids that plays stories, songs, and others. It also provides headphones, USB charging station, and storage bags. In addition, it offers home and deco products. The company sells its products through retailers, as well as online. It operates in Germany, the United States, the United Kingdom, Austria, Switzerland, the Republic of Ireland, France, and internationally. The company was formerly known as 468 SPAC I SE. tonies SE was founded in 2013 and is headquartered in Luxembourg.
